attributes.action: We stand in solidarity and will leave the NHS with our unvaccinated colleagues
attributes.additional_details: We believe in freedom of choice and bodily autonomy.
attributes.background: We would like to stop the mandate from taking affect as it is against our freedom of choice. We are not against the vaccine but it should not be a condition of deployment.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/600872
